name: Bistro Drenths-End
description: Bistro / cafetaria combination, located on a corner of the Drenthe province, in The Netherlands.

positions.title: Manager
positions.description:
While managing the Bistro and Cafeteria _Drenths-End_, I gained experience in managing, logistics and training personnel.

In an effort to simplify recurring tasks, I created:

- A local narrowcasting system for menus and product deals.
- An inventory management tool to simplify preparing wholesale orders.
